name: TOAPLAN
info:
• 别名: 東亜プラン
  • 别名: 株式会社東亜プラン
  • 别名: とうあプラン
  • 别名: Toaplan Co., Ltd.
  • 生日: 1984年
detail: Toaplan Co., Ltd. (東亜プラン株式会社 Tōapuran kabushikigaisha) was a video game developer from Japan. They were responsible for the creation of a wide array of relatively famous scrolling shooters and other arcade games. The company declared bankruptcy in 1994.

works.name: 武者アレスタ / 武者雅士达
